vote.title: Authorize acquisition of two tracts of land containing a total of approximately 20.5 acres from Wildwood Holdings II, Ltd,, located on McDonald Street near its intersection with Botham Jean Boulevard for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $1,041,769.00 ($1,034,269.00 plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $7,500.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($1,034,269.00) and Trinity River Corridor Project Fund ($7,500.00)
vote.description: Authorize acquisition of two tracts of land containing a total of approximately 20.5 acres from Wildwood Holdings II, Ltd,, located on McDonald Street near its intersection with Botham Jean Boulevard for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $1,041,769.00 ($1,034,269.00 plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $7,500.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($1,034,269.00) and Trinity River Corridor Project Fund ($7,500.00)
